artist: Artist: Hishikawa Moronobu; Artist: After Sōgi
creditline: Gift of Captain G. B. Powell, Jr., JAGC, USA
description: soft-bound book with blue cover; white label with black text on cover; calligraphic text with images of court scenes including men and women in interiors and gardens
medium: Woodblock printed book; ink on paper
portfolio: From New Edition of the Anthology of Waka Poems with Pictures by Sōgi (Shinpan waka chūsenshō eiri Sōgi 新板　和歌註撰抄　絵入　宗祇)
text: Reprint of a book by Sōgi (1421-1502) from 1484.
title: New Edition of the Anthology of Waka Poems with Pictures by Sōgi, vol. 1
